scripts.copy: rsync -aq src/content.js dist/src/ && rsync -aq src/css/* dist/src/css && rsync -aq manifest.json dist/ && rsync -aq src/icons/* dist/src/icons/ && rsync -aq src/options/options.html dist/src/options/ && rsync -aq model/* dist/model/
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && parcel build src/background.js --dist-dir dist/src/ && parcel build src/options/options.js --dist-dir dist/src/options && npm run copy
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run copy && parcel watch src/background.js --dist-dir dist/src/
